Instruction: Peel and seed the lychees, then cut them into halves.
Chop the red bell pepper, cucumber, and red onion into small pieces.
In a large bowl, combine the mixed salad greens, chopped vegetables, and halved lychees.
Add cooked shrimp to the bowl.
In a small bowl, whisk together lime juice, olive oil, salt, and black pepper to make the dressing.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss gently to coat.
Sprinkle chopped fresh cilantro over the salad before serving.
Serve chilled as a refreshing side dish or appetizer.
